An '''andesite wall''' is an [[andesite]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Andesite walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Andesite Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}
